What’s happening now?

What is this about? This is a now page as defined here which exists to explain what I’m up to lately. If you are reading this and have your own now page I’d be interested to see how you do it!

December 2025

I’m increasingly unsure why I write this. We got to know Winchester hospital pretty well. Spent some days in Devon too. Victor became a ninja. I’m too scrambled to really assemble feelings on this month.

Newly published: 2025 is over — Nico vanity shots of 2025

November 2025

Lots of work, lots of play.

We saw the Beta Band, Queens of the Stone Age, High on Fire.

We went to Brands Hatch for the trucks.

We hit the bike track, we did some astronomy, we made a noise and a mess.

Newly published: Brands Hatch camera showdown

October 2025

Older, not wiser.

September 2025

I’ve been working on possible Drecks 2 sounds and themes. I’m listening to a lot of Crookers and Princess Nokia for inspiration. Got a track mostly done provisionally titled Work which is very different to my recent other noises.

Been taking a lot of pictures on 35mm but we’ll see if anything is worth printing.

I’m putting together a maths game app Quest.

Newly published: Top straight white guy jobs in ‘25

August 2025

What’s happening

Mostly working on the website structure - got fed up with the mess that previous Claude instances made of the photo galleries and categories. Fixed up all the posts to show in the right places.

Visited the silk museum in Como which was fascinating - proper industrial heritage stuff.

Newly published: Visit to Museo della Seta di Como — Structures — Italian animals — Classy travellers — Decision time, brown — Racing worth watching

July 2025

What’s happening

Mostly I have been working on

Beacon.

Newly published: Horner had it coming — Christian’s tough day
